scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:safari
scripts.build:chrome: bash -c 'set -euo pipefail; rm -rf dist/chrome; mkdir -p dist/chrome/unpacked; rsync -a --exclude node_modules/ packages/extension/ dist/chrome/unpacked/; (cd dist/chrome/unpacked && zip -qr ../pdp-rewriter-extension.zip .); echo Built dist/chrome/pdp-rewriter-extension.zip'
scripts.build:safari: bash -c 'set -euo pipefail; xcodebuild -runFirstLaunch >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; rm -rf dist/safari; mkdir -p dist/safari; xcrun safari-web-extension-converter packages/extension --app-name "PDP Rewriter" --project-location dist/safari --copy-resources --no-open --force --macos-only; echo Built Safari project at dist/safari/PDP Rewriter'
